# 1 ( permalink ) 10-09-2009, 04:04 PM horsie2128 horsie2128 Join Date: Jul 2009 Location: Oconomowoc Wi Posts: 12 Thanks: 0 Thanked 0 Times in 0 Posts iTrader: 0 reviews No top end power Hey i have a 04 spec v and when i stand on the throttle it starts going out pretty good but once I hit about 2500 or 3000 rpms the power just dies off. It still increases but not as quick as it should just a slow constant increase and it doesn't change when I shift it is the same through all six gears. Anyone have a clue i'm at a loss thanks for the help
